title: 服务器报错求解决办法
author: 弥猫うた
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Mucrazy 于 2018-9-13 13:07 编辑 

[Server thread/WARN] [/]: Wed Sep 12 23:09:29 CST 2018 WARN: Establishing SSL connection without server's identity verification is not recommended. According to MySQL 5.5.45+, 5.6.26+ and 5.7.6+ requirements SSL connection must be established by default if explicit option isn't set. For compliance with existing applications not using SSL the verifyServerCertificate property is set to 'false'. You need either to explicitly disable SSL by setting useSSL=false, or set useSSL=true and provide truststore for server certificate verification.

还有


[Server thread/WARN] [BuildCraft/BuildCraft|Core]: ############################################
[23:09:55] [Server thread/WARN] [BuildCraft/BuildCraft|Core]: #                                          #
[23:09:55] [Server thread/WARN] [BuildCraft/BuildCraft|Core]: #  Cauldron has been detected! Please keep #
[23:09:55] [Server thread/WARN] [BuildCraft/BuildCraft|Core]: #  in mind that BuildCraft may NOT provide #
[23:09:55] [Server thread/WARN] [BuildCraft/BuildCraft|Core]: # support to Cauldron users, as the mod is #
[23:09:55] [Server thread/WARN] [BuildCraft/BuildCraft|Core]: # primarily tested without Bukkit/Spigot's #
[23:09:55] [Server thread/WARN] [BuildCraft/BuildCraft|Core]: #    changes to the Minecraft internals.   #
[23:09:55] [Server thread/WARN] [BuildCraft/BuildCraft|Core]: #                                          #
[23:09:55] [Server thread/WARN] [BuildCraft/BuildCraft|Core]: #  Any lag caused by BuildCraft on top of  #
[23:09:55] [Server thread/WARN] [BuildCraft/BuildCraft|Core]: #  Cauldron likely arises from workarounds #
[23:09:55] [Server thread/WARN] [BuildCraft/BuildCraft|Core]: #  which we apply to make sure BuildCraft  #
[23:09:55] [Server thread/WARN] [BuildCraft/BuildCraft|Core]: #  works properly with Cauldron installed. #
[23:09:55] [Server thread/WARN] [BuildCraft/BuildCraft|Core]: #                                          #
[23:09:55] [Server thread/WARN] [BuildCraft/BuildCraft|Core]: #     Thanks for your attention! ~ BC devs #
[23:09:55] [Server thread/WARN] [BuildCraft/BuildCraft|Core]: #                                          #
[23:09:55] [Server thread/WARN] [BuildCraft/BuildCraft|Core]: ############################################

replies.author: xiaodudu114
replies.txt_content:
服务器线程/WARN][/]：星期三9月12日23:09:29CST 2018 WARN：不建议在没有服务器身份验证的情况下建立SSL连接。根据MySQL 5.5.45 +、5.626+和5.7.6+的要求，如果没有设置显式选项，默认情况下必须建立SSL连接。对于不使用SSL的现有应用程序，ValuyServer证书属性设置为“false”。您需要通过设置useSSL=false来显式禁用SSL，或者设置useSSL=true并提供用于服务器证书验证的信任库。
[服务器线程/警告] [ BuffdFrave/BuildCraft核]
[23：09:55 ] [服务器线程/警告] [ BuffdFrave/BuildCraft核]

[3:09:55 ] [服务器线程/警告] [ BuffdFrave/BuildCraft核心]：请记住，构建技术可能无法提供
[3:09:55 ] [服务器线程/警告] [ BuugFrave/BuildCraft内核]：支持MODE用户，因为MOD是
[23：09:55 ] [服务器线程/警告] [ BuugFrave/BuildCraft核]：未经BukKIT/SIP的测试
[23：09:55 ] [服务器线程/警告] [BuffdFrave/BuildCraft核心]：对MiCeFrice内部设备的更改。γ
[23：09:55 ] [服务器线程/警告] [ BuffdFrave/BuildCraft核]
[23：09:55 ] [服务器线程/警告] [ BuffdFrave/BuildCraft核心]：γ-由Sub上的Bug工艺引起的任何滞后
[3:09:55 ] [服务器线程/警告] [BuffdFrave/BuildCraft核]：α坩埚可能来自于解决方案
[23：09:55 ] [服务器线程/警告] [ BuffdFrave/BuildCraft核]：我们使用它来确保BuffdWorks*
[23：09:55 ] [服务器线程/警告] [ BuugFrave/BuildCraft内核]：μi与安装的坩埚一起正常工作。γ
[23：09:55 ] [服务器线程/警告] [ BuffdFrave/BuildCraft核]
